title: A Trunk with a Difference

by CatsAreCool (Rachel500)

summary:
Harry: Draco wants me to wear this
Ron: What? He can't be serious!
Harry: He is!
Ron: You're not doing it, right? You have...
body:
Harry: Draco wants me to wear this
Ron: What? He can't be serious!
Harry: He is!
Ron: You're not doing it, right? You have dignity, Harry! Remember it!
Harry: I know, I know... but it's our wedding so I think I should wear some fancy robes...

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: Draco wants me to wear this

dialogue.name: Ron
dialogue.label: Ron:
dialogue.phrase: You're not doing it, right? You have dignity, Harry! Remember it!

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: I know, I know... but it's our wedding so I think I should wear some fancy robes...

blog.name: hogwartshousefriends
blog.title: Hogwarts House Friends
blog.description: Greetings babes. I’m Anastasia. I have a special place in my heart for both Shakespeare and Harry Potter. Icon by @risuniku. If you need something tagged that I don't already tag let me know and I will do so.

summary:
Hufflepuff: What time is it?
Ravenclaw: *looks at clock* ...Saturday.
Hufflepuff: That’s the best you can do?
Ravenclaw: There...
body:
Hufflepuff: What time is it?

Ravenclaw: *looks at clock* …Saturday.

Hufflepuff: That’s the best you can do?

Ravenclaw: There are some numbers beside it, but they could be anything.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Louis Weasley, James Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

summary: HC that Draco doesn't wander around the halls in 8th year, because doing that in Malfoy Manor or during 7th year only resulted...
body:
HC that Draco doesn’t wander around the halls in 8th year, because doing that in Malfoy Manor or during 7th year only resulted in running into bored death eaters or people like Fenrir who thought he’d be fun entertainment.

Instead, he pushes his bed to a corner in the 8th year dorm and casts about 500 protection and warning and silencing charms around his bed before he even tries to sleep.

No one hears him when he has nightmares, no one thinks he does anything other than sleep behind those churtains, except Harry who can see the haunted look of exhaustion that pepper up can never really chase away.

Then one morning, Draco doesn’t come down for breakfast. He’s not in class either. More people than Harry (or Pansy for that matter) expected are worried. So Harry grabs his map, by request of Mcgonnagal, and searches for Draco’s dot.

Draco is still in bed.

In the far corner of it, but they can’t reach it. Even Mcgonnagal can’t break the wards around Draco’s bed, by now fueled with hours and hours of fear and panic.

Nightmares are never fun, but this one had felt different, more like a profecy. Draco would get what was coming for him, what he deserved, if he got out of his cocoon. His mind was running overtime, making ever more creative scenario’s for what would happen.

Voldemort would be back, his father was behind those churtains, Fenrir would have fun with him again, all the rightfully angry witches and wizards would finally punish him for what he’d done, dementors and Azkaban were waiting out there, the corpse of his mother…

With a lot of effort, Harry and McGonnagal managed to cancel the silencing charms, so at least they could now talk to Draco. The headmistress, Harry, Pansy, Luna they all took turns trying to put Draco at ease.

Minerva called in Poppy and the best mind healers St Mungo’s had to offer, horrified when she discovered that this traumatised kid, despite the ministry telling her all students had received help over the summer, had never had anyone reach out for him. None of the Slytherins had. The man in charge mumbled something about there not being enough resources to help everyone, when Minerva released her wrath on him.

But she was also horrified when she asked the Slytherins why they’d never said anything about it, and most of them answered, we didn’t expect anyone cared about us enough to incude us. We’ve been used to doing everything on our own for years.

Meanwhile Hermione had designed a rotationg schedule with a spot for everyone who cared for Draco, so they all got a chance to talk to him through the churtains.

Pansy cried in Harry’s arms after two days of no movement. Harry cried along with her.

That was when Narcissa came in. Banished from the UK, it had taken a lot of time to finally get her to Hogwarts. Once she did, she wasted no time using all the old, ancient and highly illegal spells she knew to break down the barriers around her son. She didn’t care the spell use could put her in Azkaban.

She did care about what would happen once she broke through the walls. Her son was not to be moved, but calmed down and fed first. No one was dragging him anywhere, he deserved more respect than that.

The spells and chants were draining her magic and physical energy. One of the healers saw the rate at which it was going and begged her to stop, to not risk her life for this when not everything else had been tried yet.

Narcissa didn’t listen (she did marry the healer 2 years later, but that is a different story). She kept casting and casting until all the barriers were gone and she could collapse in peace.

Pansy was on the bed in an instant, wrapping herself around her best friend and whispering calming words to him. It looked like Draco was awake, but very very far away. The healers in the room cast discrete nurishing spells on him, but didn’t interfere.

After a few minutes, Pansy turned to Harry.

“Come here.” She beconed him over. He obeyed. “Cast a protection spell. Your magic is more powerful, he’ll find it calming. Please.”

Harry did as he was told. Then Pansy made him sit on the other side of Draco, and together they held him. Slowly, he was becoming more aware of things, softly talking about his dreams, his fears.

He was terribly embarrased by it all when he found out what had happened. Terribly concerned about his mum. Draco was a mess the following days, moving in and out of hospital to visit mind healers and his recovering mother.

He never slept alone anymore. Like it was the most natural thing in the world, Harry and Pansy joined him in bed every night, holding him, giving him the feeling of savety that he couldn’t give himself.

After graduation, they, Ron, Hermione, Theo, Dean, Seamus, Neville and Luna and quite some others collectively moved to Grimmauld Place. Over the years some of them moved out, to start a business, a family, a marriage.

One very emotional night even Pansy told Harry and Draco she was leaving, moving in with her girlfriend Millicent.

Draco had a panic attack that night. The same one that nearly killed him in 8th year, only this time Harry was there to calm him down right away. Because it wasn’t true everyone was leaving him. Harry would never leave him. Harry loved him.

“You do?” The surpirise in Draco’s voice was heartbreaking.

“Yes of course you silly man. I’ve loved you for decades.”

And that’s how Harry and Draco, at the age of 34, finally shared their first kiss.

No one hears him when he has nightmares, no one thinks he does anything other than sleep behind those churtains, except Harry who can see the haunted look of exhaustion that pepper up can never really chase away.

Then one morning, Draco doesn’t come down for breakfast. He’s not in class either. More people than Harry (or Pansy for that matter) expected are worried. So Harry grabs his map, by request of Mcgonnagal, and searches for Draco’s dot.

Draco is still in bed.

In the far corner of it, but they can’t reach it. Even Mcgonnagal can’t break the wards around Draco’s bed, by now fueled with hours and hours of fear and panic.

Nightmares are never fun, but this one had felt different, more like a profecy. Draco would get what was coming for him, what he deserved, if he got out of his cocoon. His mind was running overtime, making ever more creative scenario’s for what would happen.

Voldemort would be back, his father was behind those churtains, Fenrir would have fun with him again, all the rightfully angry witches and wizards would finally punish him for what he’d done, dementors and Azkaban were waiting out there, the corpse of his mother…

With a lot of effort, Harry and McGonnagal managed to cancel the silencing charms, so at least they could now talk to Draco. The headmistress, Harry, Pansy, Luna they all took turns trying to put Draco at ease.

Minerva called in Poppy and the best mind healers St Mungo’s had to offer, horrified when she discovered that this traumatised kid, despite the ministry telling her all students had received help over the summer, had never had anyone reach out for him. None of the Slytherins had. The man in charge mumbled something about there not being enough resources to help everyone, when Minerva released her wrath on him.

But she was also horrified when she asked the Slytherins why they’d never said anything about it, and most of them answered, we didn’t expect anyone cared about us enough to incude us. We’ve been used to doing everything on our own for years.

Meanwhile Hermione had designed a rotationg schedule with a spot for everyone who cared for Draco, so they all got a chance to talk to him through the churtains.

Pansy cried in Harry’s arms after two days of no movement. Harry cried along with her.

That was when Narcissa came in. Banished from the UK, it had taken a lot of time to finally get her to Hogwarts. Once she did, she wasted no time using all the old, ancient and highly illegal spells she knew to break down the barriers around her son. She didn’t care the spell use could put her in Azkaban.

She did care about what would happen once she broke through the walls. Her son was not to be moved, but calmed down and fed first. No one was dragging him anywhere, he deserved more respect than that.

The spells and chants were draining her magic and physical energy. One of the healers saw the rate at which it was going and begged her to stop, to not risk her life for this when not everything else had been tried yet.

Narcissa didn’t listen (she did marry the healer 2 years later, but that is a different story). She kept casting and casting until all the barriers were gone and she could collapse in peace.

Pansy was on the bed in an instant, wrapping herself around her best friend and whispering calming words to him. It looked like Draco was awake, but very very far away. The healers in the room cast discrete nurishing spells on him, but didn’t interfere.

After a few minutes, Pansy turned to Harry.

“Come here.” She beconed him over. He obeyed. “Cast a protection spell. Your magic is more powerful, he’ll find it calming. Please.”

Harry did as he was told. Then Pansy made him sit on the other side of Draco, and together they held him. Slowly, he was becoming more aware of things, softly talking about his dreams, his fears.

He was terribly embarrased by it all when he found out what had happened. Terribly concerned about his mum. Draco was a mess the following days, moving in and out of hospital to visit mind healers and his recovering mother.

He never slept alone anymore. Like it was the most natural thing in the world, Harry and Pansy joined him in bed every night, holding him, giving him the feeling of savety that he couldn’t give himself.

After graduation, they, Ron, Hermione, Theo, Dean, Seamus, Neville and Luna and quite some others collectively moved to Grimmauld Place. Over the years some of them moved out, to start a business, a family, a marriage.

One very emotional night even Pansy told Harry and Draco she was leaving, moving in with her girlfriend Millicent.

Draco had a panic attack that night. The same one that nearly killed him in 8th year, only this time Harry was there to calm him down right away. Because it wasn’t true everyone was leaving him. Harry would never leave him. Harry loved him.

“You do?” The surpirise in Draco’s voice was heartbreaking.

“Yes of course you silly man. I’ve loved you for decades.”

And that’s how Harry and Draco, at the age of 34, finally shared their first kiss.

summary: Rose: synonyms are weird because if you invite someone to your cottage in the forest, that sounds nice and cozy, but if I invite...
body:
Rose: synonyms are weird because if you invite someone to your cottage in the forest, that sounds nice and cozy, but if I invite you to my cabin in the woods, you’re gonna die.

James: my favourite is explaining the difference between a “butt dial” and a “booty call”.

Alice: it’s called connotations.

Rose: what about this one?: “forgive me father, for I have sinned.” Or “sorry daddy, I’ve been naughty”.

Alice: Great news! language is now banned!

Alice: it’s called connotations.

Rose: what about this one?: “forgive me father, for I have sinned.” Or “sorry daddy, I’ve been naughty”.

Alice: Great news! language is now banned!

summary:
James: Remus, are you a top or a bottom?
Remus: I'm a threat to your existence.
Sirius, in the distance: He's a bottom!

body:
James: Remus, are you a top or a bottom?

Remus: I’m a threat to your existence.

Sirius, in the distance: He’s a bottom!

Peter: Why are you all so concerned with this? I’d just be happy to have a bunk bed.

James:

Sirius:

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Louis Weasley, James Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

summary: In my brand new and last VLOG about London, I tell you all about the different Harry Potter shops that you can find in London...
caption: In my brand new and last VLOG about London, I tell you all about the different Harry Potter shops that you can find in London and I tell you all about my random meeting with Eduardo Lima, one of Harry Potter’s most famous designer !! If there is a need for subtitles, just ask in the comment section, on youtube, and I’ll add them ! I speak fluent English, so it won’t be any trouble ! xx
